wikipedia_page.main: Craig W. Chenery is a British-born author, screenwriter and artist with a particular interest in the zombie, horror, comedy, pop culture, Star Wars and special effects genres.

response: In 2011, Nicotero was interviewed for the 2012 zombie special effects book "Blood Splatter: A Guide to Cinematic Zombie Violence, Gore and Special Effects" by author Craig W. Chenery.

|William Shatner, Ed Asner, George Pérez, Greg Horn, Yvonne Navarro, Jeff Mariotte, Jeremy Bulloch, Vic Mignogna, Kazha, Arthur Suydam, Gil Gerard, Erin Gray, James A.
